name: 3am (itch)
description:
A text game about the stillness of being awake at 3AM, despite all efforts.

To be enjoyed patiently, like a cup of tea.

This game was funded by Patreon. If you'd like to see me make more games and get access to early builds and exclusive content, please consider becoming my Patron. Your support helps me make more games like Fragile Soft Machines and Visual Out.

It's not much, but if you'd like, consider tipping me what you'd pay for your favorite drink at a cafe. Thank you! =D
